hero-description: I am currently in my third year at ISFSC (Higher Institute of Social Training and Communication), bachelor of multimedias writing. I enjoy working on projects that have a considerable positive impact on people's daily lives. I employ a human-centered research and system design methodology to create and develop websites with clean, clear, and efficient code and user experience design. I am constantly interested in learning new technology and improving my skills. I am interested in problem solving and developing innovative and cost-effective solutions.
code-service: I help with the front-end development of your website. I have expertise in : HTML/CSS(scss)/bootstrap/Javascript/React/Vue.js/Api, and I produce clean, maintainable, and scalable code. I make certain that your website is mobile and tablet friendly. I also have experience with web accessibility and SEO (search engine optimization).
design-service: I work with you throughout all phases of the design of your website or application, applying design thinking methodologies and including all processes necessary to ensure a successful and efficient user experience. I begin by conducting user research before moving on to wireframing, drafting, designing, prototyping, and so on. I am competent in Adobe XD, Figma, Illustrator, and Photoshop.
